description:
Ranma transfers to Furinkan High School where Akane also attends. Much to Ranma’s surprise, a group of athletes aggressively greet Akane at the school gate.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Asobi ja Nai no yo Gakkou wa
La scuola non è un parco di divertimenti!
School Is No Place for Horsing Around
遊びじゃないのよ学校は
